page.title: 16FURNITURE
page.content: THIS IS A LIST OF WHAT WE TYPICALLY HAVE IN EACH ROOM OF A HOUSE NOWADAYS {KITCHEN}-FITTED UNITS MADE OF VENEER COVERED CHIPBOARD USED FOR STORING FOOD AND CROCKERY. KITCHEN APPLIANCES EG. COOKER,SINK,FRIDGE ETC. {DINING ROOM-}DINING TABLE NUMBER OF MATCHING CHAIRS. {SITTING OR LIVING ROOM}-SETEE AND MATCHING ARMCHAIRS. MANY PEOPLE HAVE AN OPEN FIRE OR GAS OR ELECTRIC FIRE. {BEDROOMS-}BEDS,WARDROBE OR A CHEST 0F DRAWERS THAT ATE EITHER FITTED OR FREE STANDING. {BATHROOM}-BATH,SINK AND TOILET ARE THE MOST COMMON THINGS FOUND IN A BATHROOM SOME PEOPLE HAVE A SHOWER. OTHER AMENITIES ARE FULLY FITTED CARPETS,TELEPHONES,TELEVISIONS, CENTRAL HEATING EITHER GAS OR OIL, AND ELECTRICITY.
